verses.verse: רוּחִ֣י <WH7307> My breath חֻ֭בָּלָה <WH2254> is corrupt יָמַ֥י <WH3117> my days נִזְעָ֗כוּ <WH2193> are extinct קְבָרִ֥ים <WH6913> the graves לִֽי׃

אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֣א <WH3808> not הֲ֭תֻלִים <WH2049> [Are there] not mockers עִמָּדִ֑י <WH5978> against וּ֝בְהַמְּרוֹתָ֗ם <WH4784> in their provocation תָּלַ֥ן <WH3885> continue עֵינִֽי׃ <WH5869> with me? and doth not mine eye

שִֽׂימָה־ <WH7760> Lay down נָּ֭א <WH4994> now עָרְבֵ֣נִי <WH6148> now put me in a surety עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> with מִֽי <WH4310> Who ה֝֗וּא <WH1931> he לְיָדִ֥י <WH3027> hands יִתָּקֵֽעַ׃ <WH8628> with thee who [is] he [that] will strike

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לִ֭בָּם <WH3820> their heart צָפַ֣נְתָּ <WH6845> For thou hast hid מִּשָּׂ֑כֶל <WH7922> from understanding עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֝֗ן <WH3651> after that לֹ֣א <WH3808> You will not תְרֹמֵֽם׃ <WH7311> therefore shalt thou not exalt
לְ֭חֵלֶק <WH2506> flattery יַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> He that speaketh רֵעִ֑ים <WH7453> to [his] friends וְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> even the eyes בָנָ֣יו <WH1121> of his children תִּכְלֶֽנָה׃ <WH3615> shall fail
וְֽ֭הִצִּגַנִי <WH3322> He hath made לִמְשֹׁ֣ל <WH4914> me also a byword עַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> of the people וְתֹ֖פֶת <WH8611> I was as a tabret לְפָנִ֣ים <WH6440> and aforetime אֶֽהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> am
וַתֵּ֣כַהּ <WH3543> also is dim מִכַּ֣עַשׂ <WH3708> by reason of sorrow עֵינִ֑י <WH5869> Mine eye וִֽיצֻרַ֖י <WH3338> and all my members כַּצֵּ֣ל <WH6738> [are] as a shadow כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> and all

יָשֹׁ֣מּוּ <WH8074> [men] shall be astonied יְשָׁרִ֣ים <WH3477> Upright עַל־ <WH5921> against זֹ֑את <WH2063> likewise וְ֝נָקִ֗י <WH5355> at this and the innocent עַל־ <WH5921> against חָנֵ֥ף <WH2611> himself against the hypocrite יִתְעֹרָֽר׃ <WH5782> shall stir up

וְיֹאחֵ֣ז <WH270> also shall hold צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> The righteous דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> on his way וּֽטֳהָר־ <WH2891> be make יָ֝דַ֗יִם <WH3027> hands יֹסִ֥יף <WH3254> shall be אֹֽמֶץ׃ <WH555> stronger and stronger

וְֽאוּלָ֗ם <WH199> But כֻּלָּ֣ם <WH3605> all תָּ֭שֻׁבוּ <WH7725> as for you all do ye return וּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> and come now נָ֑א <WH4994> now וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אֶמְצָ֖א <WH4672> for I cannot find בָכֶ֣ם חָכָֽם׃ <WH2450> [one] wise
יָמַ֣י <WH3117> My days עָ֭בְרוּ <WH5674> are past זִמֹּתַ֣י <WH2154> my purposes נִתְּק֑וּ <WH5423> are broken off מ֖וֹרָשֵׁ֣י <WH4180> [even] the thoughts לְבָבִֽי׃ <WH3824> of my heart
לַ֭יְלָה <WH3915> the night לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> into day יָשִׂ֑ימוּ <WH7760> They change א֝֗וֹר <WH216> the light קָר֥וֹב <WH7138> [is] short מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> because חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <WH2822> of darkness

אִם־ <WH518> If אֲ֭קַוֶּה <WH6960> If I wait שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> the grave בֵּיתִ֑י <WH1004> [is] mine house בַּ֝חֹ֗שֶׁךְ <WH2822> in the darkness רִפַּ֥דְתִּי <WH7502> I have made יְצוּעָֽי׃ <WH3326> my bed

לַשַּׁ֣חַת <WH7845> to corruption קָ֭רָאתִי <WH7121> I have said אָ֣בִי <WH1> Thou [art] my father אָ֑תָּה <WH859> you אִמִּ֥י <WH517> [Thou art] my mother וַ֝אֲחֹתִ֗י <WH269> and my sister לָֽרִמָּֽה׃ <WH7415> to the worm
וְ֭אַיֵּה <WH346> Where אֵפ֣וֹ <WH645> And where [is] now תִקְוָתִ֑י <WH8615> expectation וְ֝תִקְוָתִ֗י <WH8615> expectation מִ֣י <WH4310> any יְשׁוּרֶֽנָּה׃ <WH7789> who shall see

בַּדֵּ֣י <WH905> to the bars שְׁאֹ֣ל <WH7585> of the pit תֵּרַ֑דְנָה <WH3381> They shall go down אִם־ <WH518> lo יַ֖חַד <WH3162> together עַל־ <WH5921> in עָפָ֣ר <WH6083> [is] in the dust נָֽחַת׃ <WH5183> when [our] rest ס
